short_summary: The Canadian government is seeking proposals for the purchase and delivery of furniture products in the National Capital Region.
description: The [Department of Public Works and Government Services of Canada on behalf of Real property services] intends to purchase and deliver furniture products to the National Capital Region before March 31, 2023. The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can be viewed and downloaded when logged into SAP Ariba with a completed Government of Canada profile.
duration_in_months: They did not specify the duration
full_summary:
===============

### Furniture Tender

#### Details

* **Title (English/French):** Furniture (Ameublement)
* **Reference Number (English/French):** WS3348539464-Doc3665858931 (WS3348539464- Doc3665858931)
* **Solicitation Number (English/French):** WS3348539464 (WS3348539464)
* **Publication Date:** 2022-09-14
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-19T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-10-14
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-07-31
* **Procurement Category:** Government Derived (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada on behalf of the Real Property Services has a requirement for the purchase and delivery of furniture products to the National Capital Region by March 31, 2023.

#### Additional Information

* The Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account and you have filled out your Government of Canada profile.
* If you do not have an SAP Ariba account, register [here](http://canada.supplier.ariba.com/ad/register/SSOActions?type=full).
* If you already have an SAP Ariba account, login [here](http://canada.supplier.ariba.com/ad/register/SSOActions?type=full).

#### Contact Information

* Name: Alexandre Mallette (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [alexandre.mallette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexandre.mallette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

#### Solicitation URL

You can access the tender details and download the attachments by visiting the Ariba website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14101353?extsite=MTQxMDEzNTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14101353?extsite=MTQxMDEzNTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg
